sponsor: Pfizer's Upjohn has merged with Mylan to form Viatris Inc.
briefTitle: Clinical Study Of Eplerenone In Japanese Patients With Chronic Heart Failure
officialTitle: The Effect Of Eplerenone Versus Placebo On Cardiovascular Mortality And Heart Failure Hospitalization In Japanese Subjects With Chronic Heart Failure
summary: A study to compare the efficacy and safety of eplerenone in Japanese chronic heart failure patients with placebo.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With First Occurrence of Cardiovascular (CV) Mortality or Hospitalization Due to Heart Failure (HF)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Randomization up to the date when the last enrolled participant had been followed up for 1 year (up to 1744 days)
